description: ORDER ADOPTING MAGISTRATE JUDGE'S REPORT; granting  9   Motion to Compel Arbitration. The case is STAYED pending resolution of the arbitrable claims. The Parties shall submit status reports every 180 days. The Clerk of Court is directed to administratively CLOSE this case and deny any remaining pending motions as moot. Closing Case.    Signed by Judge Raag Singhal  on 3/31/2025.  See attached document for full details.     (jc)
